Name: Bulbasaur
Description: A small reptilian creature with a budding plant on its back.
Ability: Overgrow - Powers up the Pokémon's moves when its HP is low.

Name: Ivysaur
Description: An intermediate stage between Bulbasaur and Venusaur, with a larger plant on its back.

Name: Venusaur
Description: The evolved form of Bulbasaur and Ivysaur, with a large flowering plant on its back.

Name: Charmander
Description: A small fire-breathing dragon with a flame on its tail.
Ability: Blaze - Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves when its HP is low.

Name: Charmeleon
Description: The intermediate evolution of Charmander, a growing fire-breathing dragon.

Name: Charizard
Description: The final evolution of Charmander, a powerful fire-breathing flying dragon.

Name: Squirtle
Description: A small water-type turtle with a tough shell.
Ability: Torrent - Powers up the Pokémon's Water-type moves when its HP is low.

Name: Wartortle
Description: The intermediate evolution of Squirtle, a larger water-type turtle with water cannons on its shell.

Name: Blastoise
Description: The final evolution of Squirtle, a mighty water-type turtle with powerful water cannons on its shell.

Name: Caterpie
Description: A small, green caterpillar Pokémon.
Ability: Shield Dust - Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Name: Metapod
Description: The evolved form of Caterpie, resembling a chrysalis.
Ability: Shed Skin - May heal from a status condition during battle.

Name: Butterfree
Description: A butterfly-like Pokémon with colorful wings.

Name: Weedle
Description: A small, orange larva Pokémon.
Ability: Shield Dust - Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Ability: Shed Skin - May heal from a status condition during battle.

Description: The evolved form of Pidgey, a bird Pokémon known for its keen eyesight.

Name: Pidgeot
Description: A large bird Pokémon with powerful wings and sharp talons.

Description: A small bird Pokémon with a sharp beak for catching insects.

Description: The evolved form of Sandshrew, with powerful claws for digging.

Description: A small Poison-type Pokémon with a gentle disposition.

Description: The evolved form of Nidoran♀, with increased strength.

Name: Nidoqueen
Description: The final evolution of Nidoran♀, a powerful Poison and Ground-type Pokémon.

Description: A small Poison-type Pokémon with a gentle disposition.
Ability: Poison Point - May poison opposing Pokémon on contact.

Name: Nidorino
Description: The evolved form of Nidoran♂, with increased strength.
